page.title: 16ADULT LEISURE...
page.content: Adult leisure time in Methwold. I asked a neighbour some questions about the way she spends her leisure time.She enjoys playing tennis but doesn't watch sport on television. I asked what her favourite television programme was, and she decided it was "Coronation Street".She enjoys gardening, but most of all she likes doing crosswords in her spare time. In our survey about the way adults spend their leisure time we discovered that the most popular pastimes are gardening,reading and watching television.
